name: UniPower Dungeon of Death 3000
description:
UniPower Dungeon of Death 3000 is a top-down shooter taking inspiration on great games such as Binding of Isaac.  Get in this randomic adventure and  pray to the RNG Gods give you some luck  take control of Unicorn in a quest to find the princess in the last floor of this dungeon! Oh! If there's an end? Discover yourself! Defeat bugs, open chests, get deep and deeper in this mysterious dungeon! Watch out of some HUGE monsters! And the chests... Be careful when opening it! It can contain something you wouldn't want.

Instructions:

Use WASD to move Unicorn and use the Arrow Keys to turn your head around. Be careful to not break Unicorn's neck! You can use the space bar to shoot... or barf!?!

Credits:

Arthur Schilling - dungeon artist

Felipe da Rosa - character artist

Felipe Schmidt - enemies artist

Mateus Fernandes - coding

Matheus Gallas - sound designer
